recipes.name: Egg Salad
recipes.instructions: Boil eggs, chop, and mix with the other ingredients.

recipes.name: Scrambled Eggs
recipes.instructions: Whisk eggs and cook in a buttered pan.

recipes.name: Egg Fried Rice
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry eggs and rice together with soy sauce and green onions.

recipes.name: Omelette
recipes.instructions: Whisk eggs, pour into a pan, add fillings, and cook until firm.

recipes.name: Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients into a batter and cook in a buttered pan.

recipes.name: French Toast
recipes.instructions: Dip bread in egg mixture and fry in a buttered pan.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
recipes.instructions: Mash avocado, season, and spread on toasted bread.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-fry
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry vegetables with soy sauce and garlic.

recipes.name: Tomato Soup
recipes.instructions: Cook and blend all ingredients until smooth.

recipes.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.instructions: Butter bread, add cheese, and grill until golden brown.
